label: i1_health
full_name: About how many people from your household have you come into physical contact with (within 2 meters / 6 feet)?

label: i2_health
full_name: Not including those people in your household, about how many people have you come into physical contact with (within 2 meters / 6 feet)?

label: i7a_health
full_name: How many times did you leave your home yesterday?  If you are not staying at home, how many times did you leave where you are staying yesterday?

label: i5a_health
full_name: Thinking about the 7 days before your symptoms started, had you been in physical contact (within 2 meters / 6 feet) with someone who has a confirmed diagnosis of coronavirus (Covid-19), or someone with the relevant symptoms.

label: i6_health
full_name: Since developing those symptoms, have you self-isolated yourself on each of the following 7 days?

label: i7b_health
full_name: And in the last 7 days, have you physically been to the premises of a doctor, nurse, pharmacy or hospital as a result of having those symptoms?

label: i8_health
full_name: And thinking about the 7 days before your symptoms started, did you travel to a location where coronavirus has been reported?

label: i9_health
full_name: Thinking about the next 7 days... would you isolate yourself after feeling unwell or having any of the following new symptoms: a dry cough, fever, loss of sense of smell, loss of sense of taste, shortness of breath or difficulty breathing?

label: i10_health
full_name: If you were advised to do so by a healthcare professional or public health authority, would it be difficult for you to self-isolate for 7 days?

label: i11_health
full_name: If you were advised to do so by a healthcare professional or public health authority, would you be willing to self-isolate for 7 days?

label: i12_health_1
full_name: Worn a face mask outside your home (e.g. when on public transport, going to a supermarket, going to a main road)

label: i12_health_2
full_name: Washed hands with soap and water

label: i12_health_3
full_name: Used hand sanitiser

label: i12_health_4
full_name: Covered your nose and mouth when sneezing or coughing

label: i12_health_5
full_name: Avoided contact with people who have symptoms or you think may have been exposed to the coronavirus

label: i12_health_6
full_name: Avoided going out in general

label: i12_health_7
full_name: Avoided going to hospital or other healthcare settings

label: i12_health_8
full_name: Avoided taking public transport

label: i12_health_9
full_name: Avoided working outside your home

label: i12_health_10
full_name: Avoided letting your children go to school/ university

label: i12_health_11
full_name: Avoided having guests to your home

label: i12_health_12
full_name: Avoided small social gatherings (not more than 2 people)

label: i12_health_13
full_name: Avoided medium-sized social gatherings (between 3 and 10 people)

label: i12_health_14
full_name: Avoided large-sized social gatherings (more than 10 people)

label: i12_health_15
full_name: Avoided crowded areas

label: i12_health_16
full_name: Avoided going to shops

label: i12_health_17
full_name: Slept in separate bedrooms at home, when normally you would share a bedroom

label: i12_health_18
full_name: Eaten separately at home, when normally you would eat a meal with others

label: i12_health_19
full_name: Cleaned frequently touched surfaces in the home (e.g. doorknobs, toilets, taps)

label: i12_health_20
full_name: Avoided touching objects in public (e.g. elevator buttons or doors)

label: i13_health
full_name: Thinking about yesterday... about how many times, would you say you washed your hands with soap or used hand sanitiser?

label: WCRV_4
full_name: Scared that I will contract the Coronavirus (COVID-19)

label: CORE_B2_4
full_name: Compared with two weeks ago, would you say you are more happy now?

label: WCRex1
full_name: Do you think the Government are handling the issue of the Coronavirus (COVID-19) well?

label: i12_health_21
full_name: Worn a face mask inside your home

label: i12_health_22
full_name: Worn a face mask inside a grocery store / supermarket

label: i12_health_23
full_name: Worn a face mask inside a clothing / footwear shop

label: i12_health_24
full_name: Worn a face mask at your place of work

label: i12_health_25
full_name: Worn a face mask on public transportation

label: r1_1

label: r1_2

label: r1_3
full_name: Wearing a mask will protect me against coronavirus (COVID-19)

label: r1_4
full_name: Wearing a mask will protect others against coronavirus (COVID-19)

label: r1_5
full_name: Wearing a mask to protect me against coronavirus (COVID-19) is not possible for me

label: r1_6

label: r1_7

label: ct2
full_name: If you were contacted, would you be willing provide contact information?

label: ct4
full_name: If you tested positive for COVID-19 and are asked to share with health authorities the names of people you had been in contact with, would you share the names of all the people?

label: i12_health_26
full_name: Avoided attending public events, such as sports matches, festivals, theatres, clubs, or going to religious services

label: ox5_1
full_name: Trustworthiness of most people in your region

label: ox5_2
full_name: Trustworthiness of the government of your country

label: ox6
full_name: Would you say the public sector in your country is efficient?

label: w1
full_name: Is your country now more united than before the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak?

label: w2
full_name: Do you have a strong sense of belonging to your local community?

label: w3
full_name: Has your sense of belonging to your local community increased during the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak?

label: w6
full_name: In your opinion, in the past month, have other people in your community provided assistance to others, such as a friend, neighbour or co-worker, for example childcare or running errands, without expecting anything in return?

label: vac_1
full_name: If a COVID-19 vaccine were made available to me this week, I would definitely get it

label: vac_2
full_name: If a COVID-19 vaccine becomes available to me in 2021, I definitely intend to get it

label: vac2_2
full_name: I am worried about potential side effects of a COVID-19 vaccine

label: vac2_3
full_name: I believe government health authorities in my country will provide me with an effective COVID-19 vaccine

label: vac2_4
full_name: A vaccine will completely protect those who receive it from possible health effects of COVID-19

label: vac2_5
full_name: A vaccine will completely prevent those who receive it from transmitting COVID-19 to others

label: vac_3
full_name: If a COVID-19 vaccine becomes available to me a year from now, I definitely intend to get it

label: vac4

label: vac5
full_name: If a COVID-19 vaccine is available to you, will you get it?

label: vac7
